meanings: Noun 英 스카우트 (단원) (→Boy Scout, Guide, Brownie)
Transitive verb <제의·의견 등을> 딱 잘라 거절하다, 일축하다, 무시하다
Noun (연예계·스포츠계 등에서 일할) 재능 있는 신인을 발굴하러 다니는 사람
recruitment, (연예인·운동선수 등의) scout, recruit, headhunt, (연예인·운동선수 등을) scout
NOUN The Scouts is an organization for children and young people which teaches them to be practical, sensible, and helpful.
NOUN A Scout is a member of the Scouts.

vlive.korean: [하버드 설립 이래 최고 목표가 웅둥이 스카웃이라네요] 애교 빼면 시체! [Apparently, Havard's biggest goal is to get Woong in their school] Nothing without being cute! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 📖2019 휘웅휘웅 신조어 사전📖 에빼시: 에삐 빼면 시체(ღˇ◡ˇ*)♡ (Woong&DaeHwi talking about neologism)
vlive.english: [Apparently, Havard's biggest goal is to get Woong in their school] Nothing without being cute!

vlive.korean: [진지] 근데 갑자기 치킨 회사에서 스카웃 제의가 온다면? [Serious] What if you get an offer from a chicken company? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [THE100] 근데 엠씨는 누가 볼래? - EP 20
vlive.english: [Serious] What if you get an offer from a chicken company?

vlive.korean: 대형 커피 프랜차이즈에서 스카웃 제의가 들어왔어. He's being scouted by a big coffee franchise. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] SPECIAL WEEK - EP.2 SF9
vlive.english: He's being scouted by a big coffee franchise.

vlive.korean: [힙합 핵심 레이블] VMC 들어올 만한! I would scout him! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!
아, 아람단모자요? Oh! Boys Scout hat? 듣기 View video VICTON : 병찬토크🌙🐥🐶
